timeline.bodyText: could we setBody to something else? I don't really understand what the string here means... maybe something straightforward such as "new body text"?
timeline.author: stephaniewang526

replies.bodyText:
@stephaniewang526  retrieve the existing routine and updating the body value into a routine , you could check below reference code.

  
    
      java-bigquery/samples/snippets/src/main/java/com/example/bigquery/CreateRoutine.java
    
    
        Lines 48 to 59
      in
      ae97b5f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           RoutineInfo routineInfo = 
        

        
          
               RoutineInfo.newBuilder(routineId) 
        

        
          
                   .setRoutineType("SCALAR_FUNCTION") 
        

        
          
                   .setLanguage("SQL") 
        

        
          
                   .setBody("x * 3") 
        

        
          
                   .setArguments( 
        

        
          
                       ImmutableList.of( 
        

        
          
                           RoutineArgument.newBuilder() 
        

        
          
                               .setName("x") 
        

        
          
                               .setDataType( 
        

        
          
                                   StandardSQLDataType.newBuilder(StandardSQLTypeName.INT64).build()) 
        

        
          
                               .build()))
replies.author: pmakani
